analysis.headline: Your PII Shared For Ads
analysis.quote: We share information that we collect from you, such as your email, IP address or information about your browser or operating system, with our identity partners/service providers, including LiveRamp Inc. LiveRamp returns an online identification code that we may store in our first-party cookie for our use in online, in-app, and cross-channel advertising and it may be shared with advertising companies to enable interest-based and targeted advertising.

analysis.headline: Your Data Powers Other Ads
analysis.quote: Essentially, these providers combine any information they gather about you through Times Services with information they receive from their other clients. This helps them target ads to you on behalf of their other clients, not just us.

analysis.headline: Your Sensitive Data Collected
analysis.quote: Some of our surveys and feedback programs, including panels, will request your consent to provide on a purely voluntary basis information regarding your interests in various topics... as well as demographic information, some of which may be considered sensitive under applicable laws such as your age, ethnicity, race, gender, sexual orientation, family characteristics and income.

analysis.headline: Your Chats Train AI
analysis.quote: Your chat session will be recorded for quality assurance and training and may be used for training AI models. Please do not provide information in a chat session that you do not want recorded.

analysis.headline: Your Location Used For Ads
analysis.quote: If you allow us to collect your precise geolocation in the ways described above, we will use that information to personalize content provided to you... We also use your precise geolocation for other personalized experiences - those may include targeted advertising from third parties on Times Services based on your location.

analysis.headline: Your Data From Databases
analysis.quote: Privately Owned Databases Marketing, data analytic and social media-owned databases give us access to a range of information — like public data, survey data and more. This data sometimes includes your mailing address, your gender, your age, your household income and other demographic data.

analysis.headline: Your Inferences Used For Ads
analysis.quote: We use these inferences for purposes of personalization, to improve our services, to market Times Services to you and to create audiences for third party advertisers and for marketing on other sites and services.

analysis.headline: Your Data Flows Downstream
analysis.quote: our service providers may share your information with their affiliates and service providers.

analysis.headline: Your Data For Direct Marketing
analysis.quote: We may share personal information with third parties for their independent direct marketing purposes when you consent to such sharing.

analysis.headline: Your Opt-Out Burden
analysis.quote: That being said, in order to opt out of receiving these matched ads, you should also contact the applicable third parties.
